sec.title: Battery installation
sec.p: Where batteries are fitted for starting purposes or for feeding other power circuits, the following shall apply:

list-item.label: a)
list-item.p: batteries shall be positioned and secured to prevent mechanical damage. Spillage of liquid shall not be possible on components of the machine;

list-item.label: b)
list-item.p: non-sealed batteries shall be housed in a ventilated space and contain a drain path for fluids to escape;

list-item.label: c)
list-item.p: the finish of internal surfaces of battery containers shall be resistant to the chemical effects of the electrolyte;

list-item.label: d)
list-item.p: the individual battery terminals shall be protected against contact, e.g. by insulating covers or shrouds;

list-item.label: e)
list-item.p: a switch disconnect shall be fitted close to the battery. A starter isolator shall be provided when live testing or system diagnosticsÂ are required;

list-item.label: f)
list-item.p: the battery housing shall be designed and constructed in such a way as to prevent the electrolyte being ejected on to the operator in the event of rollover or tip over and to avoid the accumulation of vapours in places occupied by operators.
